name: SnowDrift (matt consto)
description:
You've crashed on a desolate planet, and your dish is shot. Explore and find your way home. Be warned, your suit is pretty heavy and you can't swim, stay out of the water!

If the game doesn't respond to keypresses, it's probably not focused so try clicking on it with your mouse.

This game was created in ~10 hours during the Global Game Jam 2018 at the University of Southampton. The game is made using raw JavaScript, CSS, and HTML - No frameworks used!
